document_data.name: ''Stoneforge Scale Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stoneforge scale armor''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[scale mail]], used in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Sets of ''stoneforge scale armor'' possessed ''+1'' and ''+2'' defensive enchantments. These sets were as tough as stones of a mountain, granting the wearer protection from elements of fire, cold, and lightning. It's weight, however, made it cumbersome to move in.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''stoneforge scale armor'' could be found worn along he mountain paths of the [[Sword Mountains]], and sold in the Mercenary Arms Depot of the city of [[Neverwinter]].
